title: Looking for Duo/Trio in Flex (Gold I currently), Previously D5 in preseason
body:
Hi, I'm Flaming Meat. Previously an Illaoi OT but with the rise of hyper ADC's and ardent she is just garbage currently, so I play mostly whats good. I finished the preseason D5, actual season Plat IV, took a long break from league and came back a few months ago playing on and off and actually getting myself banned for 'scripting' (lifted), which was chalked up due to OCE salt and false reports. I have been hard stuck in limbo between Gold I and II, having been back and forth for 5 times now, each time winning games as normal, then going on a fat loss streak and being demoted.

I'm looking for any duo or trio to try and curb my odds so we can get to at-least plat by the end of the season. I have discord.
